drinks.name: French 75
drinks.description: An elegant and festive champagne cocktail with gin, citrus and sparkling bubbles - perfect for celebrating
drinks.method: Shake gin, lemon juice and simple syrup with ice. Strain into glass and top with prosecco.

drinks.name: Limoncello Spritz
drinks.description: A light and refreshing Italian aperitif with the sweet taste of lemon and sparkling prosecco
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice. Top with prosecco and optionally soda.

drinks.name: Negroni Sbagliato
drinks.description: The 'mistaken' Negroni where gin is replaced with prosecco - a lighter and more festive version
drinks.method: Stir Campari and vermouth with ice. Strain into glass and top with prosecco.

drinks.name: Espresso Martini
drinks.description: An intense and creamy cocktail combining vodka with fresh espresso - the perfect end to a dinner
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients hard with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: White Negroni Royale
drinks.description: An elegant twist on the classic Negroni, with lighter notes of gin and limoncello topped with sparkling wine
drinks.method: Stir gin, limoncello and vermouth with ice. Strain into glass and top with prosecco.

drinks.name: Gimlet
drinks.description: A classic gin-based cocktail with fresh lime - simple, elegant and refreshing
drinks.method: Shake hard with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass without ice.

drinks.name: Gin Sour
drinks.description: A classic sour with gin as the base - fresh citrus tartness balanced with sweetness
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: An American classic with bourbon whiskey - sweet, sour and smooth in flavor
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Americano
drinks.description: An Italian aperitif with Campari and sweet vermouth - light, bitter and perfect as an aperitif
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice. Stir gently and top with soda.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A timeless Italian cocktail with perfect balance between bitterness, sweetness and botanical notes
drinks.method: Stir with ice and serve over a large ice cube.

drinks.name: Boulevardier
drinks.description: A classic and robust cocktail with bourbon, Campari and sweet vermouth - bitter, sweet and refined
drinks.method: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with a large ice cube.

drinks.name: Amaretto Sour
drinks.description: A sweet and almond-flavored member of the sour family - smooth and easy-drinking
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Gin & Tonic
drinks.description: A timeless classic with gin and tonic - refreshing and aromatic
drinks.method: Build in glass with plenty of ice and stir.

drinks.name: Espresso & Tonic
drinks.description: A modern and surprising combination of coffee and tonic - refreshing with a caffeine kick
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice and top with tonic.

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.description: A spicy and refreshing cocktail with vodka and ginger beer - traditionally served in a copper mug
drinks.method: Build in glass with plenty of ice and top with ginger beer.

drinks.name: Old Cuban
drinks.description: An elegant rum-based cocktail with fresh lime juice and sparkling prosecco - the perfect party drink
drinks.method: Shake rum, lime and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and top with prosecco.

drinks.name: Dark Rum & Lime
drinks.description: A simple yet flavorful drink with dark rum and lime - tropical and fresh
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice and stir gently.

drinks.name: Limoncello Gin Collins
drinks.description: A light and lemony cocktail with gin and sweet limoncello - refreshing and elegant
drinks.method: Shake gin, limoncello and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a tall glass with ice and top with soda.

drinks.name: Apple Pie
drinks.description: A creative and flavorful drink that captures the flavors of classic apple pie with cinnamon and apple
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients except the foam with ice. Serve and top with cinnamon foam.

drinks.name: Bubs Raspberry Licorice
drinks.description: A sweet and sour drink inspired by the Bubs Raspberry-Licorice skull candy
drinks.method: Shake vodka, lemon juice and raspberry syrup with ice until cold. Strain into a coupe glass, top with licorice foam.

drinks.name: Spiced Apple Rum
drinks.description: A warm and spiced drink with dark rum and apple juice - perfect for autumn and winter
drinks.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with ice.

drinks.name: Virgin Mule
drinks.description: Non-alcoholic Moscow Mule - spicy ginger beer with lime, just as refreshing without vodka
drinks.method: Build in glass with plenty of ice and top with ginger beer.

drinks.name: Virgin Citrus Spritz
drinks.description: A simple and refreshing citrus cocktail with soda - light and fresh
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice and top with soda.

drinks.name: Virgin Apple Pie
drinks.description: Non-alcoholic version of Apple Pie - all the lovely flavors of cinnamon and apple without alcohol
drinks.method: Build in glass with ice and top up.

drinks.name: Virgin French 75
drinks.description: A non-alcoholic version of the classic French 75 - fresh citrus flavor with elegant sparkling bubbles
drinks.method: Build in glass and top with sparkling wine or soda.

drinks.name: Virgin Espresso Tonic
drinks.description: Non-alcoholic version of the popular coffee drink - exciting combination of espresso and tonic
drinks.method: Pour espresso over ice and top with tonic.

drinks.name: Virgin Apple Mule
drinks.description: A spicy and refreshing non-alcoholic drink with apple juice and ginger beer - thirst-quenching without alcohol
drinks.method: Build in a glass with plenty of ice and top with ginger beer.
